task_units.name: Locate a store in a specified location
sub_actions: CLICK on store locator or find store link
TYPE or SELECT location details (e.g., city, state, zip code)
CLICK on desired store from results

task_units.name: Set a store as preferred or my store
sub_actions: CLICK on set as my store or similar option

task_units.name: Filter stores by specific criteria
sub_actions: CLICK on filter or refine search options
SELECT or TYPE filter criteria (e.g., services, store type)
CLICK to confirm or view filtered results

task_units.name: Check store details or additional information
sub_actions: CLICK on store name or details link
VIEW or CLICK on additional information tabs (e.g., hours, services)

task_units.name: Navigate to store locator section
sub_actions: CLICK on main menu or navigation link
CLICK on store locator or find a store option
